players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "With Diana gone, we need to be cautious. Alice, did you investigate anyone last night?"
You: "No Bob, I didn't investigate anyone - I'm not the detective. We need to figure out who among us three has that role."
Charlie: "Bob, I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She's the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, it's crucial for you to be honest. Is there any other information you can provide to back your claim?"
Charlie: "Bob, I can only share what I've discovered: Alice is the mafioso. If there was any other information, I would tell you. We need to act on this to protect the town."
